video.title: Durarara!!X2
video.synopsis: Six months after turmoil rocked the city of Ikebukuro, peace has returned. But the headless Celty still rides, and a new scheme is afoot.

episodes.synopsis: Six months have passed and the city of Ikebukuro seems unchanged, until a serial killer known only as "Hollywood" begins to strike.
episodes.title: A Picture Is Worth a Thousand Words

episodes.synopsis: Ten million yen is offered for the identity of Celty Sturluson. Raira Academy welcomes new students Mairu and Kuriri, Izaya Orihara's sisters.
episodes.title: Harmony Is the Greatest of Virtues

episodes.synopsis: Enigmatic celebrities Ruri Hijiribe and Yuhei Hanejima have a chance meeting that gives them a reason to reveal their secrets to each other.
episodes.title: Adding Insult to Injury

episodes.synopsis: While transporting some mysterious luggage, Celty must escape the biker gangs out to collect the 10 million yen bounty that was placed on her.
episodes.title: When in Rome, Do As the Romans Do

episodes.synopsis: The city is at peace again, but not for long: The womanizing leader of the Toramaru gang visits Shizuo and Celty receives a request from the Awakusu.
episodes.title: No One Knows What the Future Holds

episodes.synopsis: Unaware that Celty has been attacked, Shinra is visited at home by Shizuo and the mystery girl. Mikado tries to confirm a bad rumor about the Dollars.
episodes.title: A Crow in the Dark Night

episodes.synopsis: After fleeing the company, Varona and Sloan act as hit men in Japan. Dennis and Simon watch as Egor, the "Philosophical Killing Machine," gives chase.
episodes.title: Moscow Does Not Believe in Tears

episodes.synopsis: Traveling far from Ikebukuro, Masaomi contemplates friendship. Mikada receives an unexpected visit from Aoba. Toramaru retaliates against the Dollars.
episodes.title: The Ladies' Man Has Neither Money Nor Power

episodes.synopsis: Aoba continues urging Mikado to become the leader of the Blue Squares. Varona and Sloan pursue Celty. The Awakusu group searches for Akane and Shizuo.
episodes.title: The Day Is Short, the Work Is Long

episodes.synopsis: The conflict intensifies between the Dollars and Toramaru, as Kadota and Chikage face off. Akane remembers learning the truth about her family.
episodes.title: The Apple Doesn't Fall Far from the Tree

episodes.synopsis: As Izaya's scheme exposes Chikage's girlfriend to danger, Mikado attempts to stop cruel effects of the runaway Dollars. Akane returns home with Celty.
episodes.title: No Use Crying Over Spilt Milk

episodes.synopsis: Mayhem engulfs the city of Ikebukuro as the conflicts that had been simmering in several places boil over into violence. Mikado gives his answer.
episodes.title: Adversity Makes a Man Wise

episodes.synopsis: Six months after the chaos in Ikebukuro, life seems to return to normal, but a serial killer walks the streets and supernatural events are brewing.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: While Celty is upset that a 10 million yen bounty has been placed on her head, Mikado and Izaya have mixed reactions to new students at the Academy.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Actor Yuhei Hanejim uncovers a devastating secret about singing idol Ruri Hijiribe, while elsewhere in Ikebukuro, trouble continues to brew.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Mikado and his friends are swept into the chaos engulfing Ikebukuro while Celty craftily outmaneuvers the gangs seeking to collect the bounty on her.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Peace appears to have returned to the city, but the friends get caught up in fresh turmoil as a biker gang and a new entity descend upon them.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: While Celty battles a mysterious attacker, Mikado investigates rumors about the Dollars, and Shinra is visited by Shizou.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: In Russia, two assassins discuss the transgressors of their unwritten laws, and later, in Japan, they encounter other Russians and another hitman.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Agendas are revealed as Aoba presents Mikado with a proposal, Akane explains her murderous intentions and Chikage leads his gang against the Dollars.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Aoba continues to pressure Mikado for an answer. Varona and Sloan ramp up their pursuit of Celty, and Shizuo runs from the Awakusu Group.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Akane reveals the secrets of her past and her motives for allying with Izaya, while the strife between the Dollars and Toramaru intensifies.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Izaya's schemes endanger Chikage's girlfriend while Mikado attempts to rein in the Dollars' rampage, and the controversy over Akane may be resolved.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Ikebukuro is thrown into pandemonium as Celty searches for Akane, Varona stalks her prey, gang warfare escalates, and Mikado finally issues an answer.
episodes.title: Episode 12
